Our Sponsors & Partners

Supporting the next generation of innovators through generous partnerships and community investment.

Thank You

Lansing Tech Studio exists because of the incredible support from our sponsors, partners, and community members. Your investments in youth education and STEM learning create opportunities that transform lives and shape futures. Together, we're building a stronger, more innovative community.

Sponsorship Levels

üèÜ Platinum Sponsor

$5,000+

Benefits Include:

  • Premium logo placement on team shirts and banners
  • Featured recognition at all events and competitions
  • Social media spotlight campaigns
  • Named program or workshop opportunities
  • VIP access to student showcases and demonstrations
  • Quarterly impact reports with photos and stories
  • Recognition on all marketing materials
  • Website homepage feature

ü•á Gold Sponsor

$2,500 - $4,999

Benefits Include:

  • Logo on team shirts and promotional materials
  • Recognition at competitions and events
  • Social media mentions and features
  • Invitation to annual sponsor appreciation event
  • Website sponsor page listing
  • Email newsletter recognition
  • Access to student project presentations

ü•à Silver Sponsor

$1,000 - $2,499

Benefits Include:

  • Logo on team banners and displays
  • Social media recognition
  • Website listing on sponsor page
  • Thank you recognition at events
  • Annual impact summary
  • Invitation to spring showcase

ü•â Bronze Sponsor

$500 - $999

Benefits Include:

  • Name recognition on sponsor materials
  • Website sponsor page listing
  • Social media thank you posts
  • Annual summary of impact

Ways to Support

üí∞ Financial Sponsorship

Your financial contribution directly funds equipment, registration fees, workshop materials, and transportation to competitions. Every dollar makes a difference in providing opportunities to students regardless of their family's financial situation.

What Your Sponsorship Funds:

ü§ñ
LEGO Robot Kits

$400 each - Complete robotics kits for hands-on learning

üèÜ
Competition Registration

$150 per team - Tournament fees and materials

üöå
Transportation

$300 per event - Bus rental for competitions

üíª
Workshop Materials

$50 per student - Supplies for coding bootcamps

üéÅ In-Kind Donations

Product and service donations are incredibly valuable to our programs. We can use professional services, technology equipment, and educational materials.

Needed Donations:

  • Laptop computers for student programming
  • 3D printers and filament for prototyping
  • Arduino kits and electronic components
  • Professional development workshops for mentors
  • Printing and graphic design services
  • Event photography and videography
  • Catering for team events and workshops

üë• Volunteer Expertise

Share your professional skills with our students! Industry mentors provide invaluable real-world perspective and career guidance.

Volunteer Opportunities:

  • Guest speaking at workshops
  • Career mentoring and guidance
  • Technical skill workshops
  • Competition judging
  • Project advisory support
  • Professional network connections

Donation Options

üíù Direct Donations

Support our mission with a direct contribution. All donations are tax-deductible and go directly to supporting student programs and opportunities.

One-Time Donation

Make a single contribution at any amount.

Donate Now

Monthly Giving

Provide steady support with a recurring monthly gift.

$25/month = Robot kit in 16 months
$50/month = Full student sponsorship
$100/month = Workshop materials for 24 students
Start Monthly Gift

üéØ Current Needs

These specific items would make an immediate impact on our programs. Perfect for individual donors or smaller businesses looking to contribute.

üîß Equipment

  • LEGO SPIKE Prime Expansion Sets ($150 each)
  • Laptop computers for programming ($500 each)
  • 3D printer filament ($30 per roll)
  • Arduino starter kits ($75 each)
  • Tablet computers for research ($300 each)

üìö Educational

  • Programming books and references ($25 each)
  • STEM activity guides ($40 each)

  • Educational software licenses ($200/year)

üè¢ Facility

  • Folding tables for workshops ($100 each)
  • Storage bins and organization ($50 each)
  • Projector for presentations ($400)
  • Whiteboard and markers ($150)

üéâ Events

  • Team t-shirts ($15 each)
  • Competition banners ($200 each)
  • Awards and recognition items ($25 each)
  • Event snacks and beverages ($100 per event)

Sponsor Benefits & Recognition

üåü How We Recognize Our Partners

üèÜ Competition Presence

Your logo travels with our teams to regional and state competitions, reaching hundreds of other teams, families, and STEM professionals.

üì± Social Media

Regular features on our Facebook, Instagram, and YouTube channels reaching 2,000+ community members and families.

üìß Newsletter

Monthly newsletter recognition sent to over 500 subscribers including parents, educators, and community leaders.

üé™ Community Events

Sponsor recognition at maker faires, STEM expos, and community presentations throughout the year.
